sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yǒu fēngfù de gōngzuò jīngyàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a une riche expérience de travail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has rich work experience.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jùchǎng lǐ zuò wú xū xí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le théâtre était plein.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The theater was full.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他具有很强的领导能力。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā jùyǒu hěn qiáng de lǐngdǎo nénglì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il possède de fortes capacités de leadership.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He possesses strong leadership abilities.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā jīntiān jīngshén hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est en pleine forme aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is in good spirits today.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngsī zhèngzài kāifā xīn chǎnpǐn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise développe de nouveaux produits.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company is developing new products.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo kùzi tài cháng le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce pantalon est trop long.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: These pants are too long.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Diànyǐng mǎshàng jiù yào kāishǐ le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le film va bientôt commencer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The movie is about to start.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā jìnrù le juésài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il s'est qualifié pour la finale.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He made it to the finals.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ kōngtiáo dǎkāi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez allumer la climatisation.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please turn on the air conditioner.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā lián fàn dōu méi chī jiù zǒu le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est parti sans même avoir mangé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He left without even eating.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nà wèi lǎotàitai hěn hé'ǎi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette vieille dame est très aimable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: That old lady is very kind.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hézi lǐmiàn yǒu shénme?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Qu'y a-t-il à l'intérieur de la boîte ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What's inside the box?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Háizimen wán de hěn lè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les enfants s'amusent beaucoup.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The children are having a lot of fun.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Liánhéguó zǒngbù zài Niǔyuē.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le siège des Nations Unies est à New York.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The United Nations headquarters is in New York.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他连续工作了十个小时。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā liánxù gōngzuò le shí gè xiǎoshí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a travaillé pendant dix heures d'affilée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He worked for ten hours continuously.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ wánquán lǐjiě nǐ de yìsi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je comprends parfaitement ce que tu veux dire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I fully understand what you mean.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā dǎsuàn qù Měiguó liúxué.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle prévoit d'étudier à l'étranger aux États-Unis.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She plans to study abroad in the United States.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fángjiān tài luàn le, xūyào zhěnglǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La chambre est trop en désordre, il faut la ranger.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The room is too messy, it needs to be tidied up.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ huì qí mǎ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je sais monter à cheval.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I can ride a horse.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lìngwài, wǒ hái yǒu yī gè wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: De plus, j'ai une autre question.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: In addition, I have another question.
